title: How Low Can U.S. Yields Go?
itunes:title: How Low Can U.S. Yields Go?
description:
This week, Republican donor and Canary Drilling CEO Dan Eberhart discussed why he thinks the GOP is "headed for extinction in the suburbs" over gun control. NYU Stern School of Business Marketing Professor Scott Galloway recapped Disney's disappointing earnings and why he thinks "Lyft is no Uber." Joachim Fels, Global economic adviser at Pimco, came on to talk about why he thinks U.S. Treasury yields could go negative. Then Semaphore founder Michael Bienstock joined to discuss how he helps influencers manage their newfound wealth. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

NYU Stern School of Business Marketing Professor Scott Galloway recapped Disney's disappointing earnings and why he thinks "Lyft is no Uber." Joachim Fels, Global economic adviser at Pimco, came on to talk about why he thinks U.S. Treasury yields could go negative. Then Semaphore founder Michael Bienstock joined to discuss how he helps influencers manage their newfound wealth.

itunes:author: Bloomberg
